alert.note: Alert for Lexington (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 12 at 2:46PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Lexington County through 330 PM EDT... At 245 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles south of Dreher Island State Park, or 8 miles northeast of Batesburg-Leesville, moving east at 10 mph. ...Boaters on Lake Murray Should Seek Safe Harbor... HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lexington, Gilbert, Summit, Murray, Barr Lake, and Bundrick Island. This includes Interstate 20 in South Carolina near mile marker 54. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
